title: Course Presentation
text:
Objectives
Specifically at the end of the course students should:
Be familiar with the main technologies to deal with information stored in the web.
Be able to recognize the different formats that can be used for storage.
Know how to extract information from these formats using specificÂ R packages


Contents

Introducing technologies. Web scrapping and web scrapping projects.
Data representation in the web HTML, XML, JSON. Other technologies.
Parsing HTML using rvest
More powerful parsing of HTML and XML using CSS selectors, Regular expressions and XPath.
Parsing data using APIs
Case studies: (1) Parsing data from semi-structured documents. (2) Scraping Twitter for Sentiment Analysis. (3) Gathering data from commercial sites
